excerpt: This vegan version of a BBQ pulled pork sandwich uses juicy and flavorful jackfruit instead, perfect for a meat-free summer dinner.
instructions: Shred the jackfruit with your hands or a fork.
In a large bowl, mix together the shredded jackfruit and the BBQ sauce.
On a baking sheet lined with parchment paper, spread out the jackfruit mixture and bake for 30 minutes in the preheated oven.
To assemble the sandwich, place a generous amount of the BBQ jackfruit mixture on the bottom half of the bun, add some red onion slices and coleslaw, and place the top half of the bun over it.
